english.segment1: All's well that ends well it's too late to change this world's destiny look around hear the sounds it's doomsday and it's coming down the word is out the signs of the times begin fire engulfs our earth water escapes all who thirst i'm speaking revelations all who have an ear let them hear for the devout disaster is striking again the heat of the sons will defeat anyone who stands firm with the dying world all who have an ear let them hear the revelation.
